<title level="1" right="Spell 4" pfs="Standard">[Holy Cascade](/Spells.aspx?ID=151)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
<trait label="Good" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=83" />
<trait label="Positive" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=128" />
<trait label="Water" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=165" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 344 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Tradition**
[Divine](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=2)

**Spell Lists**
[Elemental](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=5)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Two Actions" /></row>
<row>[somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 500 feet

**Area** 20-foot burst

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Saving Throw** [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex

</row>

</column>

---

You call upon sacred energy to amplify a vial of _holy water_, tossing it an incredible distance. It explodes in an enormous burst that deals 3d6 bludgeoning damage to creatures in the area from the cascade of water. The water deals an additional 6d6 positive damage to undead and 6d6 good damage to fiends.

---
**Heightened (+1)** The bludgeoning damage increases by 1d6, and the additional positive and good damage each increase by 2d6.
name: Holy Cascade
